seo.title: Sample Landing Page with Components - powered by ButterCMS
seo.description: Sample Landing Page with Components - powered by ButterCMS

fields.headline: Welcome to your ButterCMS Proof of Concept
fields.subheadline: Use this app as your own proof of concept to explore Butter's capabilities for yourself. When you're ready, host this app and invite your team to try it out all well!

fields.headline: ButterCMS is your content backend
fields.subheadline: Butter has three core content solutions: Pages, Posts, and Collections. Combine this with advanced capabilities like localization, Write API, multi-site + multi-env and Butter is your centralized content backend no matter how much content you're managing.

fields.headline: This page is built using ButterCMS Components
fields.subheadline: This page is an example of utilizing Butter Components which allow you to build dynamic landing pages by choosing Components from a Component Library. Reuse and reorder Components in any way you want!

features.headline: Components on this page
features.description: This sample page has four component types: hero, two column with image, features, and testimonials.

features.headline: Build your own
features.description: This page is just an example set of Components. You can build your own custom Component library!

features.headline: Reorder them
features.description: Components are great because you can reorder them from your Butter dashboard

features.headline: Infinite possibilities
features.description: Build carousels, call to actions, testimonials, and much more. There's infinite flexbility.

fields.headline: Customize this page
fields.subheadline: Try updating the content of this page to reflect your own. You can also explore modifying these components or creating your own in your Butter dashboard. Learn more about Page Types and Components.

testimonial.quote: A breath of fresh air in the CMS world, once you go headless with butter you'll never go back.
testimonial.name: Bryan MacMillan
testimonial.title: IT Admin

testimonial.quote: I was able to quickly draft new pages, circulate them to the team, edit them, and then ultimately publish intuitively.
testimonial.name: Kim Kohatsu
testimonial.title: CMO
